original_text: For what pleasure hath he in his house after him, when the number of his months is cut off in the midst?
korean_text: 그의 달 수가 다하면 자기 집에 대하여 무슨 관계가 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: For what pleasure hath he in his house after him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽은 후 그의 집에서 무슨 즐거움이 있겠는가

sentences.original_text: when number of his months is cut off
